about.title: About
about.intro: Passionate Full Stack Developer with a strong foundation in modern web technologies. I specialize in building scalable, user-centric applications that solve real-world problems.
about.background: With a bachelors in Industrial Engineering and specialized training from YouCode - UM6P, I bring a unique perspective combining technical expertise with problem-solving skills. I've successfully delivered 20+ projects ranging from console applications to full-stack web solutions.
about.passion: My passion lies in creating elegant solutions with clean code, implementing best practices, and continuously learning new technologies to stay at the forefront of web development.
